snippet: Live Nation Entertainment, the concert giant, earned revenue of $2.62 billion in the third quarter, recording increases in both the number of events it put on and the number of tickets sold.
abstract: Live Nation Entertainment, which puts on thousands of concerts around world and also operates Ticketmaster, reports that it earned record revenue of $2.62 billion during third quarter of 2015.
lead_paragraph: Live Nation Entertainment, the concert giant, earned revenue of $2.62 billion in the third quarter, recording increases in both the number of events it put on and the number of tickets sold.

headline.print_headline: Live Nation Reports Record Revenue as Ticket Sales Climb
headline.main: Live Nation Reports Record Revenue as Ticket Sales Climb
